dochead.title: &PRJ.NAME; Production Install Documentation
dochead.docdesc: Details the procedure to build and install &PRJ.NAME; for production or testing.

body.p: Note: These instructions assume you are using the ksh shell.You should also check the Prerequisites document before you get started.

sectbody.p: The install script provided by the Build processing has options to backup, uninstall and install the project's files. Use the --help option for the syntax of these commands. If a previous version of the project was installed in the same BASE_DIR, it would best to use the -backup and -uninstall options of the Install script is currently in BASE_DIR/scripts.
